text: is an action-adventure video game for PlayStation 2 console system. Developed by Team Ico and Japan Studio, published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Ico's music had a small amount of audio and sound effects. == Other websites == * Official website (North America) * Category:2001 video games Category:Action- adventure games Category:Art games Category:Cooperative video games Category:Fantasy video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 2-only games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Ico
